abstract: Florent Johan Malouda (French pronunciation: ​[flɔ.ʁɑ̃ ma.lu.da] ; born 13 June 1980) is a French professional footballer who plays for Trabzonspor as a left winger. Once a prominent figure for Chelsea, Malouda was not a part of the first team squad in his final year. After a dispute over transfer wages in the summer of 2012 he trained with the U21 squad until his contract expired at the end of the season. A France international since 2004, Malouda has represented "Les Bleus" in two World Cups and two European Championships.
